mapper.insert: insert into pics(picsid , picname , image , graphsid ) values(#{picsid} , #{picname} , #{image} , #{graphsid} )
mapper.update: update pics set picname=#{picname} , image=#{image} , graphsid=#{graphsid} where picsid=#{picsid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.title from pics a , graphs b where a.graphsid = b.graphsid order by picsid desc
select a.* , b.title from pics a , graphs b where a.graphsid = b.graphsid and picsid=#{picsid} order by picsid desc
